strapiConcierge.Title: Trip Planning + Concierge Services

data.Content:
Why pay someone to do something you can do?

Great question!

If this is your life time vacation & you want to make the best of every moment you came to the right place. Weâ€™re living in an era where you can schedule everything yourself but how do you know Whatâ€™s right for you and your family?

My services will save you time, money & headacks,  we will work together on an itinerary for your trip to make it best fit your needs. Part of my services is purchasing Broadway tickets at the box office and by that already saving you a few hundred bucks. You will get to know all the trendy new places & local pop ups & then you can decide whether they are right for your trip.

More over! I will be there for you through the time you stay in NYC for everything you need including how to use the subway class ;)

For a quote shoot me your dates & family size & we will get to work

 

Services included:

  • Building full itenirary that fits your needs 
  • Boooking hotels, flights & entertainment
  • Resevations to restaurant & Night life recomandations 
  • Tickets for Broadway Shows & other events 

Pricing varies. Please contact me for a quote.
